title: SpaceRake wins $1.8 million in SDA funding for optical communications terminals
summary: The Space Development Agency awarded SpaceRake, a Cambridge, Massachusetts startup, $1.8 million to develop miniature laser communications terminals.

title: Virgin Galactic carries researchers on fifth commercial suborbital flight
summary: Virgin Galactic completed its sixth and final suborbital spaceflight of the year Nov. 2, flying two researchers and a private astronaut.

title: Iceland and Netherlands Join Artemis Accords
summary: NASA heralded another signatory to the Artemis Accords yesterday when the Netherlands joined during a ceremony in Washington, DC.  To the surprise of many, that made Netherlands the 31st country, […]

title: Space Force takes over missile-warning ground stations previously run by the Army
summary: The U.S. Space Force has officially taken over from the Army the operation of ground stations that receive data from infrared sensor satellites.

title: Viasat cutting global workforce by 10% after Inmarsat acquisition
summary: Viasat said Nov. 2 it is laying off 800 employees representing around 10% of its workforce as the satellite operator streamlines its business after buying Inmarsat.
